articles.title: WBZ files motion to dismiss most of Kate Merrill’s discrimination lawsuit
articles.description:
The motion argues filing the complaint against Merrill, investigating that complaint, and announcing her demotion weren’t driven by actual malice.

The post WBZ files motion to dismiss most of Kate Merrill’s discrimination lawsuit appeared first on Boston.com.
